main event: An unidentified object was observed during weather observations at Kobler Field, Saipan on 15 February 1955.
interesting points: The object was bright through reflected light and had an elliptical shape., The sighting lasted for one hour and 47 minutes., The object was first sighted at 1244K with specific elevation and azimuth readings., The star Rigel was noted in the reported position of the object., The observation was typical of astro sightings.
witness description: D. A. Vistal reported the sighting
